perturbation.original_text: MMI will produce products for Dragon Systems on a Turnkey basis. Initially, services will cover 3 products, as per the attached price sheets. However, this may be extended. Specific services will be: - - Receipt and Management of master materials - - Supply base management - - Production (both components & finished goods) - - Delivery - - Inventory Management - - Financial Services
perturbation.changed_text: MMI will produce products for Dragon Systems on a Turnkey basis. Initially, the manufacturing process will cover 3 products, as per the attached price sheets. However, this may be extended. Specific services will be: - - Receipt and Management of master materials - - Supply base management - - Production (both components & finished goods) - - Delivery - - Inventory Management - - Financial Services
perturbation.explanation: The terms 'services' and 'manufacturing process' are used interchangeably without defining them as identical, creating confusion about whether specific steps, like 'Financial Services,' are part of the manufacturing process.

perturbation.original_text: MMI warrants providing the Services with due diligence and care in accordance with the specifications set by Dragon Systems. Should MMI not supply the Services as agreed or should the Services become defective within 6 months from their delivery to Dragon Systems, Dragon Systems may at its option require MMI to complete or re-perform the Services within a reasonable period of time, rescind the contract or refuse payment of the compensation in part or in total, notwithstanding any damage claims.
perturbation.changed_text: MMI warrants providing the deliverables with due diligence and care in accordance with the specifications set by Dragon Systems. Should MMI not supply the Services as agreed or should the deliverables become defective within 6 months from their delivery to Dragon Systems, Dragon Systems may at its option require MMI to complete or re-perform the Services within a reasonable period of time, rescind the contract or refuse payment of the compensation in part or in total, notwithstanding any damage claims.
perturbation.explanation: The terms 'Services' and 'deliverables' are used seemingly interchangeably, but the contract does not explicitly state that the "Services" are the same as the "deliverables." This creates confusion about warranty obligations: does the warranty apply to the underlying service or just the tangible output of the service?

perturbation.original_text: MMI shall reimburse Dragon Systems and hold Dragon Systems harmless from any liabilities or obligations imposed upon Dragon Systems resulting directly or indirectly from MMI's or its employees or agents activities under this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: MMI shall compensate Dragon Systems and hold Dragon Systems harmless from any liabilities or obligations imposed upon Dragon Systems resulting directly or indirectly from MMI's or its employees or agents actions under this Agreement.
perturbation.explanation: The terms 'reimburse' and 'compensate' are subtly altered. While they both imply financial restitution, 'reimburse' typically refers to repayment of specific expenses, while 'compensate' is broader. The contract doesn't clarify whether MMI only needs to cover expenses or provide broader monetary relief.
